result.title: Dijkstra 2 â€” Sample Code O(M log N)
result.content:
#define N 111111
vector<pair<int, int> > g[N];
bool used[N];
int d[N];
int p[N];
void solve()
{
	int n, m;
	int s;

	cin >> n >> m >> s;
	REP(i, 0, m) {
		int a, b, c;
		cin >> a >> b >> c;
		g[a].push_back(MP(b, c));
		g[b].push_back(MP(a, c));
	}
	fill(d, d + n, inf);
	d[s] = 0;
	set<PII> pq;

	pq.insert(MP(0, s));
	while (!pq.empty()) {
		int v = pq.begin()->second;
		pq.erase(pq.begin());
		for (auto to : g[v]) {
			int u = to.first;
			int w = to.second;
			if (d[u] > d[v] + w) {
				pq.erase(MP(d[u], u));
				d[u] = d[v] + w;
				pq.insert(MP(d[u], u));
			}
		}
	}

	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
		cout << d[i] << ' ';
	}
	
}
